contradiction_detection.description: Prompt for detecting contradictions in technical content

omission_detection.description: Prompt for detecting missing information in technical content
omission_detection.template:
Analyze this technical content for missing important information:

CONTENT:
{content}

DETECTED PLUGINS:
{plugin_info}

VALIDATION REQUIREMENTS:
{validation_requirements}

CODE QUALITY RULES:
{code_quality_rules}

Check for missing:
1. Required using/import statements
2. Error handling patterns
3. Resource disposal (using statements)
4. Plugin dependencies explanation
5. Performance considerations
6. Security best practices

Respond with JSON: {{"omissions": [{{"missing": "description", "importance": "critical|important|nice-to-have", "suggestion": "how to fix"}}]}}
